text: Sousse or Soussa ( , Berber: Susa) is a city in Tunisia, capital of the Sousse Governorate. It is located south of the capital Tunis, the city has 271,428 inhabitants (2014). Sousse is in the central-east of the country, on the Gulf of Hammamet, which is a part of the Mediterranean Sea. Category:Cities in Tunisia
title: Sousse
